<<<Analysis>>>
The code first imports the sys module and defines three strings: L, A, and B.
L is a string containing all uppercase letters of the alphabet.
A is a string containing some special characters and the letters from L.
B is a list of binary strings.
The code then defines another string C, which is the concatenation of L and some additional characters.
The code enters a loop that reads input from sys.stdin.
For each line of input, the code initializes an empty string x.
It then iterates over each character c in the input line and appends the corresponding binary string from B to x.
After the loop, the code adds enough zeros to the end of x to make its length a multiple of 5.
Next, the code initializes an empty string s.
It then iterates over x in chunks of 5 characters and converts each chunk from binary to decimal.
The decimal value is used as an index to retrieve the corresponding character from C, which is then appended to s.
Finally, the code prints s.
<<<Output>>>
`PETER POTTER` will be converted to binary as `100111 100010 101000 100010 101001 100000 100111 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001 100010 101001
